title: Trump Is Unraveling And Stevie Wonder Is Faking 10.16.17

description:
In episode 6, Jack & Miles are joined by Daily Zeitgeist writer Alison Zeidman the 25th Amendment, the weekly tabloids, Stevie Wonder is faking his blindness, & more. Plus producer Anna Hossnieh gives a quick sexual harassment in Hollywood update.
